revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mele a2000 android stb.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Android TV Box - FullHD Internet Media Player |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://usb.brando.com/mele-a2000g-android-tv-box_p3088c51d15.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Mele |model = A2000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = G |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 11, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Mele_A2000G |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Android media player |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A10; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F32G08CBACA; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63DFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:CE:39 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Android;4.0;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, SDHC, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, VGA, SPDIF, composite AV, SD Card slot, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 6954847900044 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008PBGXWA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B0083UXI1M |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188CUS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Model: Mele A2000G *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A10 @1GHz ARM (Cortex-A8) *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) *Storage: 8GB Built-in Flash Memory (FW included) *External storage: Supports external: :2.5" SATA or USB HDD (up to 1TB), :USB Flash Drive or SD Card (up to 32GB) *WiFi: 802.11 b/g/n, OS: Android 4.0 *Network: 1x FE LAN (RJ45, 10/100Mbps) *Interface: SATA, SD/SDHC, 3x USB, :OPTICAl, LAN, HDMI, VIDEO, VGA *HDMI: V1.4, supports 1080P, 3D video playback *Video codec: HD MPEG 1/2/4, H.264, HD AVC/VC-1, :RM/RMVB, Xvid/DviX 4/5/6, RealVideo 8/9/10, VP6 *Video format: TS/M2TS/TP/TRP/MKV/MP4/MOV/AVI/ :RM/RMVB/WMV/VOB/ASF/FLV/DAT/MPF/MPEG *Audio format: MP3/WMA/WMV/OGG/FLAC/MKV :Subtitle format: SRT/SMI/SSA/ASS *Other features: Software App, MSN, Skype, QQ *Case: Material: Plastic housing, Color: Black
==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A2000 ''Mele A2000'' on '''linux-sunxi.org'''] ([http://linux-sunxi.org/images/6/68/Mele-a2000-pcb-front.jpg PCB images]) :Mele A2000 - 512MB RAM :Mele A2000G - 1GB RAM
==See also== *[[Mele A100]](G) *[[Mele A1000]](G) • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A1000 Mele A1000] *[[Mele A2000G]] *[[Mele A3700]](G) *[[Mele M9]] • [http://linux-sunxi.org/Mele_A1000G_Quad Mele 9 (A1000G Quad)]
